definition: foot (unit of length equal to 0.3048 m)
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]
square foot (unit of area equal to 0.093 m²)

sentences.english: The National Weather Service had predicted that the river would crest to about 19 feet above flood stage.
sentences.chinese: 国家气象台曾预报红河将上涨到洪水位以上19英尺。

sentences.english: Sensing food, a roach peers into a two-foot-tall pitcher plant.
sentences.chinese: 发现食物，一只蟑螂仔细观察着两英尺高的猪笼草。

sentences.english: It felt like falling headfirst off the top of a 2, 000-foot-tall building.
sentences.chinese: 我的感觉就像是头朝下跳下了两千英尺高的楼。

sentences.english: Twelve inches go to one foot.
How much does one cubic foot of air weigh at 0℃ and 76 cm. pressure?
sentences.chinese: 一立方英尺空气在0℃和76厘米汞柱压力下重多少？

sentences.english: The lengths of our containers range from 10 to 40 feet.
sentences.chinese: 我们货柜的长度从10英尺到40英尺不等。

sentences.english: The lengths of our containers range from 10 to 40 feet.
sentences.chinese: 我们货柜的长度从10英尺到40英尺不等。

sentences.english: He turned to look. He saw a 7-foot grizzly bear charge towards him.
sentences.chinese: 他转身一看，看见一只7英尺高的灰熊向他冲来。

sentences.english: Ben turned his head to look behind him. The skeleton was only a few feet away.
sentences.chinese: 本转过头朝身后看了看，那骷髅离自己只有几英尺了。

sentences.english: Jeff lowered himself to a ledge five feet down and tried to calm them.
sentences.chinese: 杰夫爬下一块五英尺高的礁石，欲安抚他们。

sentences.english: A third floor terrace had a seven-foot privacy wall.
sentences.chinese: 三楼的阳台上有一个7英尺的隐蔽墙。

sentences.english: A: The monthly rental fee is twenty-eight Hong Kong dollars per square foot.
sentences.chinese: 每月租金是每平方英尺港币二十八元。

sentences.english: In the center of town is a pair of 20-foot-long sheet metal shidas.
sentences.chinese: 垨市中心有一双20英尺长的金属凉鞋雕塑。

sentences.english: A Hawaiian green sea turtle swims in just a few feet of water.
sentences.chinese: 一只夏威夷绿海龟在几英尺水下游泳。

sentences.english: Position yourself so subjects are no farther than ten feet away.
sentences.chinese: 使自己与拍摄对象之间的距离不超过十英尺。

sentences.english: We had two Pullman cars and a 70-foot baggage car.
sentences.chinese: 我们有两个卧铺车厢和一辆70英尺长的行李车。

definition: mile (unit of length equal to 1.609 km)
square foot (unit of area equal to 0.093 m²)
height (of person)/length of clothing from shoulders to bottom (tailor or dressmaker's measure)
millibar (mbar or mb), unit of pressure (equal to hectopascal)
